attributes.additional_details: Because middle class folk like us can barely survive as it is and we need to pay a whopping 100+ for small engine cars, please do something about this
attributes.background: Lower fuel prices as it is getting hard for most of the people of Britain to survive already, fuel,energy,tax everything is going up! Please do something

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
